title: Agile Release Train
description: All of the people (expertise) needed to implement, test, deploy, and release to deliver software, hardware, firmware or other

title: Independent, Negotiable, Valuable, Estimable, Small, Testable
description: Independent of all others, Negotiable - not a specific contract for features, Valuable or vertical, Estimable to a good approximation, Small so as to fit within an iteration, Testable in principle, even if there isnâ€™t a test for it yet

title: Minimum Viable Product
description: Version of a product with just enough features to satisfy early customers and provide feedback for future product development

title: Program Increment (as in PI Planning)
description: A timeboxed planning interval during which an Agile Release Train plans and delivers incremental value in the form of working, tested software and systems
